sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './PaymentConfirmation.css'; import checkMark from '../../images/icon-complete.svg'; const PaymentConfirmation = () => { const[name, setName] = useState(null); const[number, setNumber] = useState(null); const[expMonth, setExpMonth] = useState(null); const[expYear, setExpYear] = useState(null); const[cvc, setCVC] = useState(null); return ( <>

THANK YOU!

We've added your card details

{name}

{number}

{expMonth}

{expYear}

{cvc}

); } export default PaymentConfirmation;
